+def ThapSangLuc(n):
+    doi='0123456789ABCDEF'
+    kq=''
+    while True:
+        xet=n%16

+        n//=16
+        if n==0: break

commits.content:
# ta 2 ham , hex2in(): chuyen thap luc phan sang thap phan
            # int2hex(): chuyen thap phan sang thap luc phan
def ThapSangLuc():
    doi='123456789ABCDEF'
doi='123456789ABCDEF'
print(doi[1])
